TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ksunu', title = Ksunu', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ksunu'} }

S.FORM: Ksunu' Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Ksunu' a niyaro', 71 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 245 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 231 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 89%, Amis 1%, Bunun 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Ksono' Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Ksono' a niyaro', 71 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 245 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 231 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 14 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 89%, Amis 1%, Bonon 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
